page.title: 15LEISURE IN HITCHIN (1)
page.content: In Hitchin there are two leagues for Primary School football. There is an 'A' League and a 'B' League. The Schools in the 'A' League are Purwell, Wilshere Dacre, Oughton Head, St Andrew's and Whitehill A. In League 'B' The Schools are Mary Exton, William Ransom, Whitehill B, Ickleford, Our Lady's, Samuel Lucas. We normally have 30 minutes play each way.Top of the 'A' League were Purwell and top of the 'B' League were Mary Exton. On Sundays there is a league for clubs. The Hitchin Clubs are Purwell and Westmill. They rarely play on weekdays, they usually play on Sundays. They play teams from Herts. There are leagues for 9 to 16 year olds and there are cups in every League. There is a league for Cubs.
